data.eml:eml: Animals collected for barcoding in Zackenberg, NE Greenland

The data was collected from Zackenberg, Northeast Greenland, to describe the fauna and vascular flora of the region. DNA barcodes were created for the specimens to provide a comprehensive DNA barcode library for the region. In addition, material from other parts of Greenland was also obtained, to extend the species coverage within Greenland.
